desc: Bazooka is an Italian Men's Wear Store, since 1974, located in the heart of Rome, 10 minutes walking distance from Trevi Fountain and the Spanish Steps. To dress Italian is our goal. We will help you choose the right colors, fabrics and fit that will enhance your physical features.

layout.text: If you are in Rome, don't forget to visit our old boutique, a few minutes walking distance from Trevi Fountain and the Spanish Steps.
